message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1,100,000. What do you think?
Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $950,000 at this time.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,050,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal. What do you think?
